.. _install:

============
Installation
============

.. _requirements-to-use:

Requirements
============

- GitPython>=3.1.31
- loguru>=0.7.0
- setuptools>=66.0.0
- sphinx>=4.6.0
- typer>=0.9.0
- rich

Installing from source
----------------------

.. code-block:: console

    $ git clone https://github.com/devanshshukla99/sphinx-versioned-docs
    $ cd sphinx-versioned-docs
    $ pip install .


Installing using pip
--------------------

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install sphinx-versioned-docs
